short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will translate langugage and provide pronunciation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this to translate words and phrases from one language to another.  There is also a tool to create an audio of the word or phrase so you can hear it spoken in different languages.
